price: Waan Gooftaan keessan isiniif uume jaartiiwwan teessan iraa ni dhiiftuu? Dhugumatti isin ummata daangaa dabritoota” [jedhe].
arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٌ عَادُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: watadharūna mā khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwājikum bal antum qawmun ʿādūna
